includedAssets.title: Mean Girls
includedAssets.synopsis: Lindsay Lohan hit the big time as Cady, an open-minded, home-taught student whose African upbringing leaves her ill-prepared for the human zoo that is the American high school. But after deciding to bring down the school's cattiest all-girl clique from the inside, she finds herself lured to their designer-clad dark side. Rachel McAdams and Amanda Seyfried sharpen their claws, while Tina Fey, who co-wrote the witty screenplay, also makes an appearance in this modern exaggeration of teenage life.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: High school comedy with Lindsey Lohan who struggles with a clique headed by the wicked Rachel McAdams.

includedAssets.title: Mean Girls 2
includedAssets.synopsis: A teenage tomboy forms a rival group to wrestle control of the corridors away from the shallow 'Plastics'. Sequel to the hit high school comedy.

includedAssets.title: Mean Girls Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Lindsay Lohan's new girl falls in with the shallow 'Plastics', led by the catty Rachel McAdams, who she must bring down from the inside. Later, a teen tomboy forms a rival group to take on the mean girls. Hit comedy from Tina Fey. Amanda Seyfried, Amy Poehler and Lizzy Caplan also star.

includedIn.title: Mean Girls
includedIn.synopsis: A high school new girl goes undercover to bring down the shallow 'Plastics' from the inside, but finds herself drawn into their world. Later, a tomboy attempts to take on the mean girls with her own rival group.
